Beetmon makes it easy to build your [Beet](https://github.com/mcbeet/beet) projects automatically on modify.  

## Features  
âœ… Supports `.json` and `.yaml` configurations  
âœ… Automates Beet builds with a simple command  
âœ… Allows multiple build configurations  
âœ… Easy migration from Beet to Beetmon  

## Installation
